text: “Ndipo (kumbukirani nkhani iyi) pamene Ibrahim adanena: “E Mbuye wanga! Uchiteni mzinda uwu (wa Makka) kukhala wa chitetezo, ndipo zipatseni nzika zake zipatso, amene akukhulupirira Allah ndi tsiku lachimaliziro mwa iwo. Allah adati: “Nayenso wosakhulupirira ndinkondweretsa pang’ono; kenako ndidzamkankhira ku chilango cha Moto. Taonani kunyansa malo obwerera
